summary: The module supplies a benchmark suite for measuring the transpilation time of randomized benchmarking circuits on IBM Quantum backends, supporting both parallel and single‑threaded execution. It also defines custom quantum gates used in Clifford synthesis and provides utilities to generate single‑ and two‑qubit Clifford circuits.
business_intent: Enable quantum software developers and researchers to evaluate and optimize the performance of circuit compilation pipelines, particularly for randomized benchmarking and Clifford operations, thereby improving runtime efficiency on IBM quantum hardware.
